captions.text: Hey guys, so that was the music video I shot for Ben Konstantinovi.
It was originally going to be more interesting with animation and stuff, but it didn't really work out.
So, it is what it is.
You can buy his album on iTunes and Amazon with the link below.
And over here you can check out some other videos I made for him in the past.

Why am I closing one eye?
